title: Ep. 19 No Girlfriends Allowed ft. Marcia Alene
description:
No Girlfriends Allowed!!! This week, the ladies invite author of "No Girlfriends Allowed" Marcia Alene to enjoy a nice cocktail and have a little girl talk about how no one really has a concrete answer on what a girlfriend is and why we're all trying to be one. What's the point? What are the rules? Is this really the right fit for me? Hmmm...take a listen as we discuss this, celibacy, struggling with celibacy, and how to cut him off!

Get your copy of Marcia Alene's book "No Girlfriends Allowed" at www.NoGirlfriendsAllowed.com

Join us along with Atlanta Mission to raise money and awareness for Atlanta's homeless. Visit race.atlantamission.org to join our team CockTales Podcast or to make a donation.

Visit Josephine Lounge on Buford Hwy in Atlanta for The R&B edition of One Love One Mic. Tickets are $10, contact @onelove1mic for tickets.

Be sure to follow us at

@cocktalespodcast
@KikiSaidSo
@coffeebeandean
@TVHost4You
and our guest @nogirlfriendsallowed

Subscribe, Rate and Review!
